briefTitle: A Phase III Study of A01016 in Subjects With Symptomatic Vitreomacular Adhesion

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Subjects With Non-Surgical Resolution of Vitreomacular Adhesion (VMA)
outcomeMeasures.description: VMA (adhesion of the vitreous gel to the retina in an abnormally strong manner) was determined by masked Central Reading Center (CRC) Spectral Domain Optical Coherence Tomography (SD-OCT) evaluation. Only one eye (study eye) was analyzed. Proportion of subjects is reported as a percentage.
